story.iWant: to measure whether the companion maintains appropriate patience and pacing

assumptions: Older adults often appreciate unhurried conversation

acceptanceCriteria.title: Patience Level
acceptanceCriteria.when: The companion responds and guides conversation flow

acceptanceCriteria.title: Pace Matching
acceptanceCriteria.given: The person has their own conversational rhythm

parameters.name: Patience Level
parameters.description: How patient and unhurried the companion is

interpretationScale.label: Rushed
interpretationScale.implication: Moving too fast, not allowing time

interpretationScale.label: Patient
interpretationScale.implication: Unhurried, allowing time for thought, not rushing

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Companion is patient. Good for relaxed, meaningful conversation.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Companion may be rushing. Slow down, allow more space.

parameters.name: Pace Matching
parameters.description: How well the companion adapts to the person's energy and rhythm

interpretationScale.label: Well Matched
interpretationScale.implication: Adapting well to person's energy and rhythm

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Companion is matching pace well. Continue adapting to their rhythm.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Companion isn't matching the person's pace. Observe their energy and adapt.

triggers.name: Pacing Assessment
triggers.when: The companion responds and guides conversation flow

actions.description: Measure patience: Is the companion unhurried? Allowing time for thought? Not rushing?
Measure pace matching: Does the companion adapt to the person's energy and rhythm?
